titles.title: A resolution designating April 6, 2007, as "National Missing Persons Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 115.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/17/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates April 6, 2007, as National Missing Persons Day.
